Source code for ognon.model

"""
This module define the Ognon model

It describes every data that can be write on the disk. they are nested python
classes. With no method description.
"""


[docs]class Project():
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name
        self.anims = {'master':Anim()}
        self.config = {}

        


[docs]class Anim():
    def __init__(self):
        self.layers = [Layer()]



[docs]class Layer():
    def __init__(self):
        self.elements = [Cell()]



[docs]class Element():
    pass

    

[docs]class Cell(Element):
    def __init__(self):
        self.lines = []



[docs]class AnimRef(Element):
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name



[docs]class Line():
    def __init__(self, coords):
        self.coords = coords
